AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalShar.label: APIC, Share-based Payment Arrangement, Increase for Cost Recognition
AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalShar.description: Amount of increase to additional paid-in capital (APIC) for recognition of cost for award under share-based payment arrangement.

AllocatedShareBasedCompensationExpense.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Expense
AllocatedShareBasedCompensationExpense.description: Amount of expense for award under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes amount capitalized.

Capital.label: Banking Regulation, Total Capital, Actual
Capital.description: Amount of total capital as defined by regulatory framework.

CapitalRequiredForCapitalAdequacy.label: Banking Regulation, Total Risk-Based Capital, Capital Adequacy, Minimum
CapitalRequiredForCapitalAdequacy.description: Amount of minimum total risk-based capital required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

EquipmentExpense.label: Equipment Expense
EquipmentExpense.description: This element represents equipment expense including depreciation, repairs, rentals, and service contract costs. This item also includes equipment purchases which do not qualify for capitalization in accordance with the entity's accounting policy. This item may also include furniture expenses.

HostingArrangementServiceContractImpleme.label: Hosting Arrangement, Service Contract, Implementation Cost, Capitalized, after Accumulated Amortization
HostingArrangementServiceContractImpleme.description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of capitalized implementation cost from hosting arrangement that is service contract.

HostingArrangementServiceContractImpleme.label: Hosting Arrangement, Service Contract, Implementation Cost, Expense, Amortization
HostingArrangementServiceContractImpleme.description: Amount of amortization expense for capitalized implementation cost from hosting arrangement that is service contract.

TierOneRiskBasedCapital.label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Risk-Based Capital, Actual
TierOneRiskBasedCapital.description: Amount of Tier 1 risk-based capital as defined by regulatory framework.

TierOneRiskBasedCapitalRequiredForCapita.label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Risk-Based Capital, Capital Adequacy, Minimum
TierOneRiskBasedCapitalRequiredForCapita.description: Amount of minimum Tier 1 risk-based capital required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

HostingArrangementServiceContractImpleme.label: Hosting Arrangement, Service Contract, Implementation Cost, Capitalized, Accumulated Amortization
HostingArrangementServiceContractImpleme.description: Amount of accumulated amortization of capitalized implementation cost from hosting arrangement that is service contract.

CapitalizedComputerSoftwareAmortization1.label: Capitalized Computer Software, Amortization
CapitalizedComputerSoftwareAmortization1.description: Amount of expense for amortization of capitalized computer software costs.
